General.Name: Sidma S.A. Steel Products
General.Description: Sidma S.A. Steel Products engages in processing and trading of steel products in Greece and internationally. It offers flat products, such as hot rolled, pickled and oiled, cold rolled, galvanized, pre painted, and plastified surface coils and sheets, as well as corrugated and trapezoidal sheets, and shipbuilding plates. The company also provides long products, including hot rolled steel bars with rectangular, square, equilateral and non-equilateral angular, T-shaped and squere cross-section; hot rolled narrow flange I-beams with taper flanges, hot rolled beams with U-shaped cross-section, and hot rolled medium and wide flange I-beams with parallel flanges; and hot rolled KS crane rails and ASCE rails. In addition, it offers tubes comprising rolled and galvanized hollow structural sections; electric resistance welding (ERW) and scaffolding steel tubes; ERW construction galvanized steel tubes; and wall tubes. Further, the company provides wire products. Sidma S.A. Steel Products was founded in 1931 and is headquartered in Aspropyrgos, Greece.
